name: Funny Triangle Man
description:
This is a game I made for my friend Edsterama

Check out Eds twitch https://www.twitch.tv/edsterama

This is just a small game you could beat in under 10 minutes, It has a total of 5 endings that are easy to find and unlock.

You can use WASD or the arrow keys to move. To interact press E.

If you progress through the game too fast some voice lines may be cut off. If you want to avoid this wait for the voice line finishes before progressing.

This game took some inspiration from The Stanley Parable (Check it out if you haven't already)

I might make a longer game like this in the future so keep an eye out for that.
